column4: can someone please help me with this "FATAL: Module ndiswrapper not found" when i try to modprobe
can someone please tell me why modprobe can't find ndiswrapper?
but i don't know what to do next
and it's in the right place in /lib/?
the ndiswrapper module is in ubuntu already, use that
i don't know how. i was having problems with getting my wifi to work, so i read in a forum to delete ndiswrapper and reinstall it
ignore anything you read on the forums unless someone with clue outside the forums says it is correct
i followed that whole wiki and it didn't work
didn't work is not a useful description of the problem
i could get ndiswrapper to install bcmwl5. The card showed in the network settings dialog and even showed the APs, but wouldn't connect...
the light for the card won't light up
what am i looking for in dmesg?
